name: Relax Color by Number
description:
Relax Color is a game for drawing by numbers. In the paint you can color the bright pictures by numbers. We add new pictures for drawing every day.

We offer a huge selection of categories of paints: paints - animals, paints - fantasy, paints - mandalas, paints - flowers, paints - nature, paints - unicorns and many others. We have more than 20000 images for stress relief. And it’s all colorable by numbers. Share your masterpieces with friends and relatives, with your family and enjoy paint by numbers and beautiful works of art together with them!

How to color paints by numbers in the application? Simply select one of the pictures, touch the cells according to the color numbers from the palette. Try it now and draw fantastic images in your paint by numbers! Enjoy the simplicity and ease of drawing by numbers, as well as the convenience of the interface: use the hints if you can't find the tiny hard-to-find cells.

Our application includes many paints by numbers for family. Color by number beautiful pictures you’ve never seen in other games for coloring. Games for coloring are so simple and fun, they are best for relaxing and relieving stress. Have fun with this relaxing drawing process.

Paints by numbers help to reduce stress and relax. Suitable for relaxation in the evening. Also great for mindfulness exercises.

Paints are so beautiful that you want to share the joy and creativity with the whole family.

Want to know what a masterpiece your fingers can create? Try paint by numbers - Relax Color!
